content:
# The error indicates that I incorrectly used the `Position` object when trying to insert items into the Stone Furnace. 
# Instead, I should be using the furnace entity itself as the target for the insertion.

# I will first retrieve the Stone Furnace entity from the map and then insert the Coal and Iron Ore into it.

# Fetching the Stone Furnace entity from the map.
furnace_entity = get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace}, Position(x=0, y=0))[0]  # Assuming there is only one furnace at this position.

# Now, I will insert Coal into the furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace_entity, quantity=5)  # Inserting 5 coal into the furnace.

# After that, I will insert Iron Ore into the furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace_entity, quantity=10)  # Inserting 10 Iron Ore into the furnace.
